text: Burdino () is a rural locality (a village) in Levinskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 79 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 25 km from Bolshaya Sosnova, 4 km from Levino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Burdino
